content: नमस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} A bow, salutation, obeisance, adoration; (this word is, by itself, invariably used with <ab>dat.</ab>; तस्मै वदान्यगुरवे तरवे नमोऽस्तु <ls>Bv. 1. 94</ls>; नमस्त्रिमूर्तये तुभ्यं <ls>Ku. 2. 4</ls>; but with कृ, generally with <ab>acc.</ab>; मुनित्रयं नमस्कृत्य <ls>Sk.</ls>; but sometimes with <ab>dat.</ab> also; नमस्कुर्मो नृसिंहाय {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%} The word has the sense of a noun, but is treated as an indeclinable.) {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Food. {@--3@} A thunderbolt. {@--4@} A gift, present. {@--5@} A sacrifice.
